subject: Test different parameters in single test case
msgSnippet: Hi All, I have functioanlity which picks xml file and pass it through TIBCO processing which will then insert data from xml to oracle database. Now requirement
messageBody:
Hi All,
I have functioanlity which picks xml file and pass it through TIBCO processing which will then insert data from xml to oracle database.

Now requirement is to process it automatically,means to pick up all xmls and run them through TIBCO processing.

Suggestion is to test them through Junit so that we can capture Test Result.

As my number of xmls will be changing how can I write single test case which can take different file each time and process it and accumulate results and give it in JUNITREPORT format.

As per my analysis , I need to generate (through some code generator logic) different methods for every file.

Please suggest. :)
